splash.title: AI Jobs
splash.subtitle: Revolutionizing job search with Artificial Intelligence

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: We want to revolutionize the way people find jobs thanks to Artificial Intelligence

steps.title: The Challenge of Change
steps.description: The advent of Artificial Intelligence is causing a transformation in the job market with unprecedented speed.

steps.title: Our Response
steps.description: We want to use AI to govern this change and bring the world of recruitment up to the challenges of today.

steps.title: The Social Importance
steps.description: In a context of increasingly massive migration flows, this has become an ethical, social and political issue of primary importance.

steps.title: The Integrated Solution
steps.description: An ecosystem capable of governing the meeting between job supply and demand in a much more integrated way than classic portals and able to cover 'end-to-end' all the needs of companies and workers.

problems.title: The Problems
problems.subtitle: The challenges we face in the European job market

steps.title: Labor Shortage
steps.description: Labor shortage in European strategic sectors (healthcare, construction, IT).

steps.title: Training Mismatch
steps.description: Mismatch between training and labor market needs.

steps.title: Migration Flows
steps.description: 380,000 irregular crossings registered in the EU in 2023.

steps.title: Border Management
steps.description: Difficulties in managing and identifying migrants at borders.

steps.title: Integrated Policies
steps.description: Need for integrated European policies on work, training and migration.

steps.title: Access to Verified Talent
steps.description: Database of qualified and certified professionals, ready to be quickly integrated into the company.

steps.title: Precision Matching
steps.description: Artificial Intelligence analyzes company needs and finds the most suitable profiles, reducing selection time and costs.

steps.title: Quick Selection
steps.description: Digital tools to manage interviews and assessments efficiently, accelerating the hiring process.

steps.title: Skills Verification
steps.description: Objective assessment of candidates' skills through tests and certified references.

steps.title: Onboarding and Training
steps.description: Onboarding and training programs to quickly integrate new hires and promote their professional growth.

steps.title: Performance Monitoring
steps.description: Digital tools to evaluate and develop staff skills, improving company productivity.

steps.title: Document Verification
steps.description: Control and validation of candidate documents to ensure compliance and security in hiring.

steps.title: Compliance and Security
steps.description: Support in compliance with labor, immigration and data protection regulations, for a safe and compliant business environment.

workers.title: How It Works for Workers
workers.subtitle: Tools and support for your professional success

steps.title: Certified Profile
steps.description: Complete and verified digital profile that certifies your skills, experiences and qualifications, facilitating the match with companies.

steps.title: Skills Validation
steps.description: Practical tests and professional assessments to ensure your skills are recognized and usable in the job market.

steps.title: Digital Portfolio
steps.description: Digital space to showcase projects, certifications and references in a professional and easily shareable way.

steps.title: Intelligent Matching
steps.description: Artificial Intelligence analyzes your profile and connects you with opportunities best suited to your skills and aspirations.

workers2.title: How It Works for Workers
workers2.subtitle: Tools and support for your professional success

steps.title: Interview Preparation
steps.description: Interview simulations and personalized feedback to help you present yourself best to companies.

steps.title: Multilingual Support
steps.description: Assistance in preparing CVs and cover letters in different languages, to increase your international opportunities.

steps.title: Document Management
steps.description: Complete support for visas, work permits and all documentation needed to work abroad.

steps.title: Cultural Integration
steps.description: Language courses and training on local culture of the destination country to promote rapid integration.

steps.title: Relocation Logistics
steps.description: Assistance in finding accommodation and support for relocation, to make your work journey abroad simple and secure.

differences.title: Differences From What Exists
differences.subtitle: How our solution stands out from existing alternatives

ngo.title: NGO Refugee Work
ngo.description: Support for refugees in job search

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: A complete integration of all these services in a single platform, ensuring a safe and sustainable path from training to employment.

bulgaria.title: A European Project Starting from Bulgaria
bulgaria.subtitle: Bulgaria's strategic position in digital transformation

steps.title: Bulgaria's Transformation
steps.description: Bulgaria is at a crucial moment of positive transformation: it has taken a decisive path towards digitalization, distinguishing itself for administrative agility and openness to innovation, especially in the public and technological sector.

steps.title: How to Start
steps.description: We propose the launch in Bulgaria of an advanced digital ecosystem for matching job supply and demand, integrating technology, social impact and public-private cooperation.

steps.title: The Crucial Role of Institutions
steps.description: The project has significant social and ethical implications, addressing issues of inclusion, safe labor mobility and professional dignity. Active participation of governments and local institutions is fundamental to ensure its legitimacy, fairness and sustainability over time.

steps.title: Pilot Project
steps.description: Launch in a selected region of Bulgaria as a national and European demonstration model.

steps.title: Experimentation Laboratory
steps.description: Creation of an operational laboratory to test digital and organizational solutions that can become a replicable prototype in other EU countries.

steps.title: Training Hub
steps.description: Construction of a center of excellence for training and certification (competence centers). Collaborations with companies and schools can be initiated.

steps.title: Public-Private Collaboration
steps.description: Activation of synergies between European funds, institutions, social stakeholders and industrial partners.

steps.title: International Branding
steps.description: Positioning Bulgaria as a European leading node for innovation in work and professional mobility.

steps.title: Pilot Region Selection
steps.description: Careful selection of the initial region based on specific criteria and local support.

steps.title: Framework Definition
steps.description: Definition of a legal, organizational and technological framework.

steps.title: Launch of Core Components
steps.description: Start of the experimental laboratory and training hub.

steps.title: Microcredit Program
steps.description: Launch of the microcredit program for workers and SMEs.

steps.title: Impact and Expansion
steps.description: Impact assessment and plan for European extension.
